content: finished size width 13 5 cm lenght before sewing ~ 5cm less than the head circumference gauge 10 cm = 21x30 supplies yarn- drops air 50g ~150m drops kid silk 25g ~210m to knit 53 cm long headband i needed 1 piece of each yarn total weight 73 g needles - rund needles 4 5 mm markers - 2 peaces scissors tapestry needle tape measure
